control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs a detonation chamber capability within [Assignment: organization-defined information system, system component, or location].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system protects against an individual (or process acting on behalf of an individual) falsely denying having performed [Assignment: organization-defined actions to be covered by non-repudiation].
